Sentencas: As a potential fuel electrode for solid oxide cells, La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-delta perovskite suffers from phase decomposition in reducing atmosphere at operational temperature.
Titulo: Calcium stabilized La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-δ perovskite as ceramic fuel electrode for solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In this work, Ca is introduced to its A-site to stabilize the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Calcium stabilized La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-δ perovskite as ceramic fuel electrode for solid oxide cell

Sentencas: While doping Ca is demonstrated to be achievable in the full compositional range, only La0.6Sr0.1Ca0.3Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-delta is stable in hydrogen atmosphere at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Calcium stabilized La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-δ perovskite as ceramic fuel electrode for solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The doping improves the thermal expansion compatibility with electrolyte, increases the oxygen vacancy concentration and content of adsorbed oxygen species, but reduces the electronic conductivity.
Titulo: Calcium stabilized La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-δ perovskite as ceramic fuel electrode for solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the doping increases the electrochemical performance as the fuel electrode, such as reduces the interfacial polarization resistance by 38% to 0.13 omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C, increases the peak power density by 17% to 1.05 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C when operated in fuel cell mode with humidified hydrogen as the fuel, and shows a high current density of 1.89 A.cm(-2) at 800 degrees C when evaluated in electrolysis cell mode to electrolyze pure CO2.
Titulo: Calcium stabilized La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-δ perovskite as ceramic fuel electrode for solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Overall, doping Ca not only prevents the possible phase transition but also improves the catalytic activity as fuel electrode for solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Calcium stabilized La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Mn0.2O3-δ perovskite as ceramic fuel electrode for solid oxide cell
